episodes.title: False Prophet | The Rise and Fall of Natureboy | The Cult of Eligio Bishop
episodes.description:
Welcome to The Art of Deception—where we expose the lies, manipulation, and hidden truths behind some of the most shocking modern movements. In this episode, we dive into The Cult of Eligio Bishop, a self-proclaimed 3God who once went by Natureboy and led a nomadic spiritual commune known first as Melanation and later as Carbon Nation.

This Carbon Nation Documentary unpacks The Story of Carbon Nation, from its beginnings in Central America to Eligio Bishop’s Costa Rica Deportation, and ultimately, to his Georgia cult headquarters, where things took a much darker turn. Once celebrated as a spiritual revolutionary, Bishop was later arrested and convicted—bringing to light The Crimes of Natureboy and the full extent of Natureboy’s crimes against his followers.

In this False Prophet Documentary, we explore the disturbing tactics used by this manipulative leader—tactics that turned a conscious community into a tightly controlled cult. With firsthand testimony, court records, and social media archives, this video is Eligio Bishop Exposed like never before. This is the Carbon Nation Scandal unraveled. These are the Cult Leader Crimes the world needs to understand.
